title: Perform a First Article Inspection (FAI)
description: A new product is being run for the first time. A quality inspector must perform a First Article Inspection (FAI) to validate the production process.

tasks.description: Retrieve the engineering drawings and all specifications for the new product.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all technical documentation required for the FAI.

tasks.description: Measure every dimension on the first part produced and record it against the drawing specifications.
tasks.expected_outcome: Inspector performs the detailed measurements and enters them into the FAI report form.

tasks.description: Submit the completed FAI report for engineering approval before authorizing the full production run.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits the report, and production is held pending approval.
